item.title: The First Apple Homepage
item.description: via http://kfury.com/the-first-apple-homepage Looks positively old-fashioned now, but the memories! I donâ€™t remember this particular page, but I do remember compiling and using Mosaic as my first web browser on an old DECstation 5000, my first Unix workstation.
